trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Parkville
There were no other sightings in Parkville on or around July 3rd 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was around 1 PM on a very hot Saturday afternoon in my backyard in Parkville MD. on July 3rd 2010. I was watching my boys play in their swimming pool. I happened to look up at the sky. Their were very few clouds. I noticed a Very fast flying sphere extremely high in the sky. I first thought it was an airplane, but it was totally round in shape. I didn't notice any wings. That's when I got excited. I didn't hear any noise. It was moving SE to NW in a straight line. I see planes all of the time, from passenger planes to military planes high in the atmosphere. The object I saw left no exhaust trails and moved faster then any flying object I have ever seen. It was only in view for less 30 seconds. If I didn't look up when I did, i would have missed it.
Summary: Very fast flying sphere. Extremely high in the sky. No noise. Moving SE to NW.
